channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- COMOS V10.2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- COMOS V10.2

item.title: CVE-2023-24482|2024-08-02T10:56:04.164Z -- siemens -- comos%20v10.2
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in COMOS V10.2 (All versions), COMOS V10.3.3.1 (All versions < V10.3.3.1.45), COMOS V10.3.3.2 (All versions < V10.3.3.2.33), COMOS V10.3.3.3 (All versions < V10.3.3.3.9), COMOS V10.3.3.4 (All versions < V10.3.3.4.6), COMOS V10.4.0.0 (All versions < V10.4.0.0.31), COMOS V10.4.1.0 (All versions < V10.4.1.0.32), COMOS V10.4.2.0 (All versions < V10.4.2.0.25). Cache validation service in COMOS is vulnerable to Structured Exception Handler (SEH) based buffer overflow. This could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service condition.
